short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse with ease in a predefined set of URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of navigating among hundreds of open browser tabs when you are working in repetitive tasks in your admin interface. Use URL Browser to specify your URL template and the list of variables which identifies your page and boom!
If you want to boost your productivity even more then use the keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl | Cmd + Shift + Comma, Ctrl | Cmd + Shift + Period) to navigate through your URL list and boom, again!
